Package com.lambdaschool.countries

Class PopulationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lambdaschool.countries.PopulationController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/population")
public class PopulationController
extends java.lang.Object
    The entry point for clients wishing to access country data based on population.

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> findLargerPopulations​(long people)
      List of countries with a population of the given size or greater
      Example: http://localhost:8080/population/size/1000000000

      Example: http://localhost:8080/population/max

      Returns the country with the median population
      Example: http://localhost:8080/population/median

    • Method Detail

      • findLargerPopulations

        @GetMapping(value="/size/{people}",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> findLargerPopulations​(@PathVariable
                                                                        long people)
        List of countries with a population of the given size or greater
        Example: http://localhost:8080/population/size/1000000000
        Parameters:
        people - the minimum population you seek
        Returns:
        JSON list of countries with a population of the given size or greater
